<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/deletecollectionitem"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a single item from a Collection.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["collectionId","itemId"],"properties":{"collectionId":{"type":"number","description":"The ID of the Collection to remove an item in."},"itemId":{"type":"string","description":"The item ID of the CollectionItem to remove from this Collection."},"documentId":{"type":"string","description":"The (optional) Glean Document ID of the CollectionItem to remove from this Collection if this is an indexed document."}},"title":"DeleteCollectionItemRequest"}}},"description":"Data describing the delete operation.","required":true,"x-exportParamName":"Request"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"collection":{"type":"object","description":"Collection object","title":"Collection"}},"title":"DeleteCollectionItemResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request"},"401":{"description":"Not Authorized"},"422":{"description":"Failed to save deletion"},"429":{"description":"Too Many Requests"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
